project1.title: Tamagotchi
project1.description: In this project I used what I learned of ES6 modules and SASS to create a Tamagotchi. The Tamagotchi has four values eat, fight, play, sleep.Which go up or down depending on the button you click.
project1.technologiesUsed: HTML, SCSS, JavaScript, ES6 Modules, Version Control with Github

project2.title: Hat-Exercise
project2.description: This project is an exploration into Bootstrap 4. I used a Bootstrap jumbotron to display a form that can create bootstrap cards with different house names from Harry Potter. The color of each card is based on which house you get and you can also expel a card from the collection.
project2.technologiesUsed: HTML, Bootstrap 4, JavaScript, Version Control with Github
